message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $10500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I was really hoping to get closer to the value you place on the product. I'm willing to meet you at $11500. What do you think?

I understand your position, Alice. I'm grateful for your flexibility. Given my financial situation, I would like to propose $11000 as the price for the product. This is the highest I can go while still staying within my budget.
